sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; function MovieCard({ imageUrl, altText, title, category, cast, director, producer, synopsis, reviews, trailerUrl, playTrailer, rating, bookMovieLink, }) { const [detailsVisible, setDetailsVisible] = useState(false); return (
setDetailsVisible(!detailsVisible)} />

{title}

{detailsVisible && ( <>

Category: {category}

Cast: {cast}

Director: {director}

Producer: {producer}

Synopsis: {synopsis}

Reviews: {reviews}

)}

MPAA-US film rating code: {rating}

); } export default MovieCard;
